sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.LicensingCacheManager</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This class act as a bridge for interaction with EntitlementCacheManager.</description>
        <name>LicensingCacheManager</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LicensingCacheManager = Class.create();

/*
Any change in this class would invalidate the RCA that needs to be changes to "Allowed" again.
*/
LicensingCacheManager.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this._cacheManager = new global.EntitlementCacheManager();
    },

    getDataFromCache: function(catalog, cache) {
        return this._cacheManager.getDataFromCache(catalog, cache);
    },

    putDataIntoCache: function(catalog, cache, object) {
        this._cacheManager.putDataIntoCache(catalog, cache, object);
    },

    flush: function(catalog) {
        this._cacheManager.flush(catalog);
    },

    type: 'LicensingCacheManager'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-05 13:34:11</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8f9aa61a43453110b4a1c083a9b8f2d8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LicensingCacheManager</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8f9aa61a43453110b4a1c083a9b8f2d8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-08 17:23:23</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
